div.p:
Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem
primo die mensis Octobris Anno domini millesimo quingentesimo nono
Quo die sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent
Andreas Watson'
thomas Dauysone'
Duncanus andersone
Robertus Dauisone
Willelmus Richerdsone
thomas laisk in nevburgh
longus Wat in monycabok
andreas baxter in nevburgh'

thomas Watson' in gownis
thomas Wodman
Andreas Watson' in Cullan
Symon michel
Dauid hay
georgius Johnson'
Johannes Watson' in garntuly
Andreas gordone
Willelmus bynne
Johannes herroun'
alexander tulidef
Robertus fraser
alexander neische
Patricius Ramsay
Dauid bannerman Junior
Willelmus blakhal de

Eodem die Gilbertus Menyheis Electus fuit in Officium Pre
positure pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Johannes Colisoun' Johannes mar Patricius leslie et Alex
ander Menyheis Electi fuerunt in Officium balliuorum pro Anno
Instanti prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die Wilhelmus Scrimgeoure Normannus leslie Andreas
naughtie et Johannes Cuk electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum
pro Anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot
minister domus sancte trinitatis dictj burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris
pro vno annuo redditu quinque solidorum sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito
de quadam terra vasta Jacobi pyor Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico viridi ex
australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Alexandri gothra ex orientali
ex vna et terram quondam Johannis torreleitht ex occidentali et communionem
viam regiam versus boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne scrogis gilberto Ricardo
litstar et Donaldo stane postore Ac Johanne Cuk sergeando et cetera

Eodem die accedens ad Barram discretus vir magistri Alexander bisset
capellanus perpetuus altaris sanctj sanguinis infra ecclesiam perrochialem
beati nicholaij de Aberdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro
vno annuo redditu iiijor solidorum monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim
debito et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in futy inter terram thome lammyntone ex boreali
Et terram altaris Sanctj leonardi ex australi et le linx versus
oriens et maris fluxum versus occidens Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo makesone Wilhelmo bonetmakar et ormando leslie sergeando

The said' day it was statut' ordanit and concludit for the obseruing
and kepin of the Statutis of this burghe and commone wele of
the toune that the iiijor sergeandis sale ouklie Ilkane ouk pas' with
thar cunnaris throw the toune Ilkane in his avne quartar and tast
the ale and Set it et cetera sa the brede weing the flesche prisin
and forthir excerce thar office in ale pontis according' tharto Ande gif
ony of tham happinnis to falye in ony poynt befor expremit in
the excucion of thar office and beis conuict' tharof thai salbe

The said day the Prouost bailyeis Counsaile and Communite licencit'
master Dauid menyeis Chaplane of saint petiris alter situat' withtin
the paris' kirk of the said burgh' to pas' in his lessum erandis quhar
he is direct' eftir the tenour of my lord Aberdenis licenc grantit
to him tharapone'

Inquisicio facta Apud burgum de Abirdene primo die mensis Octobris Anno Dominj
Millesimo quingentesimo non Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preposito Johanne Colisoun'
Patricio leslie et Alexandro menyeis tribus balliuorum dicti burgj in pretorio eiusdem
in Curia Capitali pro tribunali sedenti per subscriptos videlicet Johannem leslie de Warderis
Johannem Cullane Thomam chawmyr thomam Wod Willelmum porter Willelmum blakhale
Alexandrum malisone Johannem Kintor Willelmum murray Willelmum Colp Johannem moyr ga
vinum murray et Willelmum stile burgensis dicti burgj Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam
Thomas pratt pater Elizabeth prat latricius presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus
vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de vno annuo redditu quatuor marcarum vsualis
monete scocie annuatim exeunti an de quadam terra ipsius thome Jacente infra dictum burgum in
vico castri ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Alexandri howisone ex orientali
et aliam terram ipsus quondam thome ex occidentali Et de vno annuo redditu 4or solidorum
annuatim de terra quondam ipsius q thome Jacente ex eadem parte eiusdem vici inter dictam terram
suam ex orientali ex vna et terram Johannis Cullane ex occidentali partibus ab altera
Et de vna pecia terre vaste Jacente extra portas vici castri prope fontem angelicum
ex boreali et quemdam ortum thome scrogis versus occidens oriens et communionem viam regiam
versus occidens et metham sine flumij marinj versus austrum Et quod dicta j Elizabeth
est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dictj quonam thome patris suj de dictis
annuis redditibus et pecia terre cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod valores dictorum
annorum reddituum patent in se Et quod dicta pecia terre valet nunc per annum duodecim
denarios et valuit sex denarios tempore pacis Et quod decim annuj redditus et pecia terre
tenentur in Capite de supremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existunt
in manibus domini nostri regis legittime per se ipsum per decessum d quondam anabelle gordoun'
relicte ipsius quondam thome coniunctam infeodacionem eorundem habens per spacium quinque mensium aut
eocirca In defectu viri heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis datum et clausis sub
Sigillo et cetera

Curia gilde burgi de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto
die mensis Octobris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo nono

Eodem thomas Chamer et Duncanus Colisone Electi fuerunt
decanj gilde pro Anno Instanti cum adiutorio preposito prestitis
solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Patricius leslie et georgius Bisset Electi
furunt magistri fabrice ecclesie pro Anno Instanti prestitis solitis
Juramentis

head.add: Auditores Compoturm magistri fabrice ecclesie et decanorum gilde

div.p:
Eodem die gilbertus menyeis prepositus Johannes leslie de Warderis
Johannes Cullan andreas Cullane patricius leslie thomas Waus
thomas Wod et Dauid mar Electi fuerunt Auditores compotorum
magistri fabrice ecclesie et Decanorum gilde prestitis solitis Juramentis

gren' quarter
Johannes cuk sergeandus Willelmus skene et Johannes tailyeouris

The said day thir personis vnder writin was Chosin and suorne be the
prouost bailyeis and Counsale to serche and seik ale vnlauchfull personis
resettouris and gudis wrangwisly reddet takin or Intromettit witht
thar bailyeis and officiaris ilk man in thar quarter that is to say
Evin quarter
Johnne of mar bailye Normond' leslie officiar
Dauid adamsone
Androu stratoun'

ffuty quarter

Grene quarter
Patry leslie bailye Johnne cuk sergeand'
gilbert litster
Alexander roche
Johnne red Wobstar
Johnne' Wilyeamsone Wobstar

The said day allane litster tuk him to preif on' mononday that nixt
Cummis that meg fraser the wif of Androu low was avin him
xxxj s' of siluer'

div.head: Commissio Balliuorum in burgo
div.p:
Vniuersis pateat per presentes nos burgenses et Communitatem burgj de Abirdene
fecisse constituisse et ordinasse Necnon tenorem presencium facere constituere et ordinare
nostras dilectos conburgenses Johannem mar Johannem Colisone patricium lesly et
Alexandrum menyeis balliuos supremj domini nostri regis et nostros dantes et conce
dentes eisdem ac eorum cuilibet Insolidem coniunctim et diuisim nostram plenariam potesta
tem et mandatum speciale Curia nostras Incipiendum tenendum et delinquendum
amerciamenta earundem leuandum modificandum Justiciam conquerens ministrandum
cum consensu amerciamento et deliberacione prepositi et communis consilij nostri
burgj terras redditus et possessionis dictj burgj assedandum firmas et
fractus earundem petendum exigendum et recipiendum et leuandum Ac pro eisdem
si necesse fuerit distringendum Nostros conburgenses stallangiatores et eorum
seruientes omnesque alios libertari dictj burgj adherentis eorum bona et catalla
ad curia nostras forum crucem et libertatem dictj burgj vbicumque per quescumque
et coram quibuscumque Judicibus Justiciariis Camerariis aut balijs pla
citatj seu arrestati fuerint replegiandum et reducendum Ac omnia alia
et singula faciendum gerendum et excercendum que ad officium balliuorum
seu balliuj coniunctim et diuisim in hac parte de Jure pertinens
Ratum gratum firmum et stabile habens et habiturum tocium et quicquid
dictj balliuj nostri aut eorum aliquis in premisse aut premissorum aliquo
nomine nostro Rite duxerint faciendum sub ypotheca et obligacione
omnium bonorum nostrorum In cuius Rei testimonj Sigillum nostrum Communem presentibus
pro vno Anno duraturum est appensum apud dictum burgum primo
die mensis octobris Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo nono

The said' day It was statut ande ordanit be the prouest bailyeis and' cownsel
that na aile be saulde in this toun' but for viij d' the galloun' be fre folkis and
vj d' the galloun' be onfre folkis for this Instant yeir vndir the pane of breking
of Comone ordinancis

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die
mensis octobris Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo nono

The said day Dauid steuart followit Wilyeame boll skipper with the strintht
of ane borghe for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of certane malt quhilk
come hame in the barg out of Danskin quhilk Wilyeame beand' accusit
be Johnne' colisone ane of the bailyeis of the said burgh' sittand' in iugment
for the wranguis' withhaldin of the said malt fra the said Dauid / denyit
that he had done ony wrang to the said Dauid in the halding of the said
malt and in continent thareftir with consent of baitht the said partijs the
said actioun' was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' of thir personis
vnder writin that is to say thomas Waus Androw fif Wilyeame Wormet
mathou branche malcum crag Johnne arthour Johnne Kintor Johnne
murray Androw litster androu stratoun' Duncan fif robert hil Alexander
Kintor androw lousone and thomas quhilkis being riplie auisit the greit aitht
the richtis ressonis and allegacionis of bath the said partijs herd sene and vndirstandin
deliuerit and fand be the moutht of the said thomas Waus forspekar that
the said Wilyeame boll hed' done na wrang to the said Dauid in the
haldin of the said malt And atour ordanit the said Dauid to ressaue his
said malt and pay the said Wilyeame his fraucht as vthiris merchand'
men' did quhilk fracht the said bailye chargit the said Dauid
to pay within terme of lawe

The said day Androw nachtj sergeand' at command of Johnne' colisone bailye
chargit Elizibeth linthoris to remain within the tolbutht or ellis find' souerte
to pay Wilyeam his fraucht for xj bollis of malt within thre Tidis

The said day Duncan arthour and Johnne tailyour grantit thaim awand' to charlis
stevin xviij s' for ane byll quihilk was tynt in thar defalt and apprisit be certane
suorn' personis to the said' sovme quhilkis John of mar bailye chargit thaim to pay within
terme of law

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die
mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The said' day Androw low grantit him awand' tile Allane litster xxxj
s' scottis money to Compt and Rekinning quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law .

The said' day allane litster one that ane part and' Androw low one that vthir
part oblisit thame to stand' at the ordinancis ande deliuerancis of gilbert litster
Richard' litster and' Johnne litster chosin be thame to considir tua barrel of as'
sauld' be the said' Androw to the said' allane gif thai be merchand' gude sufficient and
conuenient for the said Allanis craft or nocht

The said' day Androw lowsone litstar grantit that he aid laid In Jak lawsonis schip
ane' barrel of salmond' one the behalf of Androw lousone And' oblisit him that give
the said Androw or his factouris gat nocht the said' barrel of salmond' in the veyr that he
suld' pay aslmekil for the said' barrel of salmond' as salmond' costis thair

The said' day Williame boyl skipper offerit him reddy to deliuer Dauid stewart
his malt eftir the tenour of the deliuerancis of ane assis' gane obefor Protestand'
that quaht skaith the said' malt sustenit ande Inlakit in the lyning suld' cum
one the said' Dauid and nocht one him considerand' he was reddy to deliuer the samyn

The said' day Nichol castel and Donald' scot oblisit thame vndir the pane of
banysing of the town' to keip ale the gatis of the town' clene and' dycht thaim
als oft as nedis ffor the quhilkis thai sale haue ane' penny of Ilk fyr hows'
and ilk merchand' butht to be pait four tymis in the yeir And' the toun'
hais grantit thame licencis and pover to tak ale tubbis stullis burrowis vechtis
and ale vthir siclik Instrumentis that bringis ony filth and castis apone the gait and'
to keip the samyn one to the tyme thai be pait for the dychting of the said' gait
And elikwis' to tak hors' and ale vthir bestis that makis stabling' or fylth apone
the gait

The said' Normund' leslie protestit that quhat skathis costis and dampnis he sustenit
in falt of payment of xv s' be Johnne Connan to Sande nory he micht recouer apon'
the said Johnne Coonnan as he that vas oblisit to freith him at the handis of the said'
Sande nory

Eodem die Willelmus vobster conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore mathei branche
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Ade rossel cuj emendabit vt Jura volunt

The said' day It vas deliuerit be ane' suorn' assis' mathow branch forspekar
that Cristy symmyr sale deliuer and pay to thomas Wod half ane' barrel of girls'
quhilk he promittit tile his wif quhilk the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

The said daye Thomas Wod' tuk him to preif this day xv dais that he
bocht ale the salmound' and girls' that Cristy symmir saltit for xl s' the barrel
of salmound' and xxtj s' the barrel of girls'

The said' day It vas statut and ordanit be the prouest bailyeis ande cownsel
that ale the d baxtaris of this burgh' sale bak the tua d' laif of gude sufficient
bowtit flour weyand' xxxtj vncis and penny bred' weyand' xv vnce
vndir the pane' of brekin of commone ordinance
